title: Toothpick Dental
description:
As a backend developer at Toothpick Dental, I played a pivotal role in enhancing operational efficiency and user experience by developing a comprehensive system tailored to the needs of dental nurses and practices. Collaborating closely with dental professionals, I gained deep insights into their requirements, allowing me to optimize our web application for seamless workflow management.

Key contributions include:

  • System Development: Spearheaded the development of a robust system aimed at optimizing data tracking and staff scheduling for Toothpick Dental.
  • Dental Nurse Subsystem: Engineered a dedicated subsystem empowering dental nurses to effortlessly post their availability and record working hours.
  • Practice Subsystem: Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface for dental practices to efficiently request staff resources from Toothpick Dental.

My role demanded a blend of technical expertise and strong communication skills to effectively bridge the gap between user requirements and system functionality. Through collaborative efforts with stakeholders, I successfully delivered a solution that streamlined operations and improved user satisfaction for both dental professionals and Toothpick Dental alike.

title: The Timeless Tutor
description:
This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.

As the backend developer at Timeless Tutor, my responsibilities included:

  • Containerization of code in Docker for efficient deployment.
  • Maintaining a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins for automated testing and deployment.
  • Designing the system architecture to ensure scalability and reliability.
  • Backend development, implementing features and functionalities.
  • Version control management using Git for effective collaboration.
  • Database design and management for efficient data storage and retrieval.

The project resulted in a live mentorship app where users can register as mentors or mentees. Mentorship groups can be created or joined, facilitating real-time chat discussions and group calls.

title: Evo Store
description:
At Pagoda Labs, I played a crucial role in maintaining and enhancing Evo Store, one of Nepal's most renowned online electronic stores. As a key member of the team, I was responsible for adding new features and optimizing the site to ensure an exceptional user experience.

My responsibilities included:

  • Regularly meeting with clients to gather requirements and understand their needs.
  • Implementing changes to the site based on client feedback and requirements.
  • Optimizing features such as payment integration, quick checkout carts, and more to enhance functionality and user satisfaction.

Through my efforts, Evo Store continued to thrive as a leading online destination for electronic products in Nepal.
